Great plugin. Used it on Win 10. Just 2 Suggestions.

1. Plugin should allow disabling notifications for individual accounts. For example, I may have 5 gmail accounts logged in but I might need notifications for only 2 of those.

2. The taskbar notification on email arrival does not show which account received that email. This is very much required.

I will uninstall it till then. Hopefully you will implement these. Thanks.

This extension usually works well, however it's been giving me issues for the last few days. It'll display when you have a new message, but an error prevents you from doing anything with it. You just receive a cryptic "core.js -> at" error notification and the action fails.

This extension is a 5/5 when it works, but this issue as well as the issues I've experienced in the past make it a 3/5.

2) By default, only 4 accounts are used. The workaround is to manually add the further ones in the feed in the options.

The different customization options are very cool! However, this extension is not compatible for (at least some) Chromebook devices.
